short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mark comments as having story tl;dr

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows to mark certain comments at Hackers News as "tl;dr". tl;dr with most votes will be promoted to front page below link to original article. This way you can read today's news summary right from front page.

Extension is open source and licensed under GPLv2 license.

GitHub repo: https://github.com/hippich/chrome-hn-tldr
